forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city shrouded in a gauzy veil of cloud, presents a tranquil but somewhat muted atmosphere. The gentle sway of the west-southwest winds whispers through the streets, hinting at the coolness that will soon envelop the night. At this hour, the temperature hovers comfortably at around fifty-two degrees, inviting warm layers to combat the early evening chill. Although the forecast predicts mostly cloudy skies, there’s a sense of subtle anticipation; beneath the clouds lies the promise of tomorrow’s sunshine, beckoning with a high near sixty-two.

Looking beyond the present, Wednesday's dawn will unfurl with a clearer disposition. As the clouds disperse, the sun's rays will dance across the rooftops and beckon all to engage with the day. The winds, still playful with gusts reaching up to twenty-six miles per hour, will invigorate those who venture outdoors. Dressing in layers will be key, balancing comfort against the brisk winds of the early morning while preparing for the warmer embrace of the afternoon sun. For the evening, a quiet stroll along the waterfront might be the best way to savor the day’s end, perhaps with a warm beverage in hand, as one contemplates the intricate beauty of a city both classic and ever-evolving.
